#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Data
```{r}
drukjachten_data <- read.csv("./dashboard/input/F04_3_data.csv",
                         sep = ",",
                         header = TRUE)

```

#Grafiek
```{r}
Plot_aantal_DMOGG <- ggplot(data = drukjachten_data,
                      aes(x = as.factor(Jaar),
                          y = Aantal_drukjachten,
                          fill =provincie_toek)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", 
           position = "stack") +
  labs(x = "Jaar",
       y = "Aantal drukjachten") 


Plot_aantal_DMOGG
```
